mods.li: Science Never Stops: Ambition of the Cosmic

value.description:
A highly intricate device that devises more efficient methods of skinning people alive, producing Unbalancedite, and other Unbalancedite products.

Stats: Requires 5K Watts

 Provides 25% research speed boost to nearby research benches. Does not stack with other Stellar Analyzers.
Enables researching the [NAME_HERE] technology and later Generation 1 'Unbalanced' technologies.

An advanced device that steals small amounts of Torture Matter from nearby Torture Liquid Union empires, allowing for direct experimentation with Torture Liquid.

Stats: Requires 25K Watts

 Provides 75% research speed boost to nearby research benches. Maximum connections per research bench: 2.
Enables researching the [NAME_HERE] technology and later Generation 2 'Overpowered' technologies.

The culmination of all ambition, dreams, and desire, the Call of Torture is able to tunnel into to a place called the Realm of Torture, also known as the Torture Dungeon to those who went there and survived, allowing for great experimentation.

Stats: Requires 100K Watts

 Provides 250% research speed boost to nearby research benches. Maximum connections per research bench: 2.
Enables researching the [The Great Unknown] technology.

An arcane super-computer that uses the very fabric of reality as its processing unit for the sole purpose of devising new methods of torture and the further exploitation of human suffering.

Stats: Requires 1.5M Watts

Provides 1000% research speed boost to nearby research benches. Does not stack with other Pattern De-Abstraction Devices.
Unlocks the [The First Cycle] technology.
